question: Who chaired the 12th meeting of the Standing Committee of Inter-State Council (ISC), in Delhi recently?
explanation: The Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh chaired the 12th meeting of the Standing Committee of Inter-State Council (ISC), in Delhi. Volumes-I & II were discussed during the eleventh meeting of the Standing Committee in April 2017 and Volumes-VI and VII will be discussed during the next meeting of the Standing Committee.
